title: Food
description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player.

can_always_eat.title: Can always eat
can_always_eat.description: If true you can always eat this item (even when not hungry), defaults to false.

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.description: How much nutrition does this food item give the player when eaten.

saturation_modifier.title: Saturation modifier
saturation_modifier.description: Saturation Modifier is used in this formula: (nutrition * saturation_modifier * 2) when appling the saturation buff. Which happens when you eat the item.

using_converts_to.title: Using converts to
using_converts_to.description: When used, convert the *this* item to the one specified by 'using_converts_to'.
